title: Drawing, "Apollo Driving the Chariot of the Sun, for the Sala di Apollo e Diana, Palazzo Bianchetti, Bologna", 1810–23
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush and brown wash over pencil on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. God driving in chariot with four horses, above clouds, suppporting lyre with left hand;  seen in front, above an arc with three signs of Zodiac: Lion, Virgin, Scales.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Apollo Driving the Chariot of the Sun, for the Sala di Apollo e Diana, Palazzo Bianchetti, Bologna", 1810–23.
1810–23. Pen and dark brown ink, brush and brown wash over pencil on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1638.
